By Lisa Shock on Saturday, August 28, 2004 - 06:51 pm:

Recap

This was the worst attended tourney in the history of tournies. PT and I were in chat at the posted time and no one showed up. So, we waited 2 hours, and still no one showed up. I ran the event, and an hour later, Infernus showed up for the last few battles.

Hero wins, with every round as 3-0 in his favor.
